name: Let's Play (Kraktu)
description:
Let's Play is a 2 day GameJam game realised by a team of 5 person, 2 Artists, 2 Game Designer and 1 Dev at Technocité in Mons (Belgium) during december 2019.

Let's Play can be finished under 10 minutes, have fun !

Start the game !!

Let's Play is a strange Puzzle game that take place in a friendly child room. Try to start the game and explore your environement  to find out how to repair... The most important feature in a game ! The Start Button !

Be prepaired to get trolled, confused and amused !

Let's Play is not really hard, but may be confusing ! Have fun !

Controls : mouse & keyboard.
